text: فَأَكَلَا مِنۡهَا فَبَدَتۡ لَهُمَا سَوۡءَٰتُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخۡصِفَانِ عَلَيۡهِمَا مِن وَرَقِ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۚ وَعَصَىٰٓ ءَادَمُ رَبَّهُۥ فَغَوَىٰ

translation.en: And Adam and his wife ate of it, and their private parts became apparent to them, and they began to fasten over themselves from the leaves of Paradise. And Adam disobeyed his Lord and erred
translation.id: Lalu keduanya memakannya, lalu tampaklah oleh keduanya aurat mereka dan mulailah keduanya menutupinya dengan daun-daun (yang ada di) surga, dan telah durhakalah Adam kepada Tuhan-Nya, dan sesatlah dia
